summary: Based on the provided documents, there is no mention of Steve Fallis. The documents primarily concern HSCA staff payroll records and notifications from the Assassination Records Review Board regarding the postponement of releasing Social Security numbers to protect personal privacy. The documents detail payroll information, employment history, and related correspondence for various HSCA staff members, including Anne Paul Wilander, Cecelia T. Morton, Paul A. Zevnik, Sari Mordana, Margo E. Jackson, Nancy P. Schultz, and Judith R. Burford. The documents focus on administrative and privacy-related matters concerning HSCA staff rather than investigative findings or connections to individuals involved in the JFK assassination.
significance: Based on the provided documents, Steve Fallis has no significance in the JFK context.
